data.eml:eml: Taxonomy of Trigonocnera Reitter, with the description of a new species (Coleoptera, Tenebrionidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ba, Yi-Bin, Ren, Guo-Dong (2009): Taxonomy of Trigonocnera Reitter, with the description of a new species (Coleoptera, Tenebrionidae). Zootaxa 2230: 51-56, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.190268
